00060 #define MSG_WM_CREATE(func) \
00061     if (uMsg == WM_CREATE) \
00062     { \
00063         SetMsgHandled(TRUE); \
00064         lResult = (LRESULT)func((LPCREATESTRUCT)lParam); \
00065         if(IsMsgHandled()) \
00066             return TRUE; \
00067     }

01790 // Generic message handlers
01791 
01792 #define MESSAGE_HANDLER_EX(msg, func) \
01793     if(uMsg == msg) \
01794     { \
01795         SetMsgHandled(TRUE); \
01796         lResult = func(uMsg, wParam, lParam); \
01797         if(IsMsgHandled()) \
01798             return TRUE; \
01799     }
01800 
01801 #define MESSAGE_RANGE_HANDLER_EX(msgFirst, msgLast, func) \
01802     if(uMsg >= msgFirst && uMsg <= msgLast) \
01803     { \
01804         SetMsgHandled(TRUE); \
01805         lResult = func(uMsg, wParam, lParam); \
01806         if(IsMsgHandled()) \
01807             return TRUE; \
01808     }
01809 
01811 // Commands and notifications
01812 
01813 #define COMMAND_HANDLER_EX(id, code, func) \
01814     if (uMsg == WM_COMMAND && code == HIWORD(wParam) && id == LOWORD(wParam)) \
01815     { \
01816         SetMsgHandled(TRUE); \
01817         func((UINT)HIWORD(wParam), (int)LOWORD(wParam), (HWND)lParam); \
01818         lResult = 0; \
01819         if(IsMsgHandled()) \
01820             return TRUE; \
01821     }
01822 #define COMMAND_ID_HANDLER_EX(id, func) \
01823     if (uMsg == WM_COMMAND && id == LOWORD(wParam)) \
01824     { \
01825         SetMsgHandled(TRUE); \
01826         func((UINT)HIWORD(wParam), (int)LOWORD(wParam), (HWND)lParam); \
01827         lResult = 0; \
01828         if(IsMsgHandled()) \
01829             return TRUE; \
01830     }
01831 #define COMMAND_CODE_HANDLER_EX(code, func) \
01832     if (uMsg == WM_COMMAND && code == HIWORD(wParam)) \
01833     { \
01834         SetMsgHandled(TRUE); \
01835         func((UINT)HIWORD(wParam), (int)LOWORD(wParam), (HWND)lParam); \
